img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(95\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/12/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2895%29.png)
Continue down this path until you end up outside and find the beads on the ground.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game.

Continue down this path until you end up outside and find the beads on the ground."
        - Following Text: "For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character standing in a dimly lit cave-like area with intricate carvings on the walls. The character is holding a staff weapon and facing an illuminated outdoor area. A red marker highlights an object of interest on the ground ahead, likely the "beads" mentioned in the preceding text. This image serves as a visual guide to help players locate the beads while progressing through the game.
